code: class  Solution  {   public :   bool  isAcronym ( vector < string >&  words ,  string  s )  {   if  ( words . size ()  !=  s . length ())   return  false ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  words . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( words [ i ][ 0 ]  !=  s [ i ])   return  false ;   return  true ;   }  };
